ProductInfo.Features:
Package Includes:  GW3008HD DVR (no hard drive include), Remote Control and mouse, FREE 1 Year Warranty and FREE Life Time Tech Support within U.S.
8 Channel H.264 video compression format *** FD1/CIF/960H/Q960H Recording *** 8ch 960H Full Channels Realtime Playback
Support HDMI/VGA/BNC/SPOT/Loop Simultaneous Output *** Support Icon Interface,User Friendly & Easy-Operate *** Support AVI Backup,Snapshot,Record Lock,Record Cutting
4 USB Ports, Supports Up to 64TB (8 * 8TB hard drives)
iPhone, Android Viewing. Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control
